word:
Those who have a leading influence in the institution should be men and women who possess devotion and piety; who are not narrow and selfish, but conscientious, self-denying, and self-sacrificing; who have an eye single to the glory of God. They should be in the world, but not of the world. Men of such a 
                                                                           206
character will keep the way of the Lord, and they will be constantly teaching others by precept and example.
